meanings.definition: To write without restrictions or guidelines.
meanings.sent1: She freewrites in her journal every morning.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy freewriting as a way to express my thoughts freely.
meanings.sent3: He freewrites so much that his notebook is filled with random musings.
meanings.sent4: Her mind freewrites like a river flowing endlessly.
meanings.sent5: Freewriting allows creativity to flow without boundaries.

meanings.definition: A piece of writing done without constraints.
meanings.sent1: Her freewrites are always full of interesting ideas.
meanings.sent2: I found a collection of old freewrites in the attic.
meanings.sent3: The teacher was surprised by the quality of his freewrites.
meanings.sent4: His freewrites were like windows into his inner thoughts.
meanings.sent5: Reading her freewrites felt like exploring a hidden world.

meanings.definition: The act of writing without inhibition.
meanings.sent1: His freewrites revealed a side of him no one had seen before.
meanings.sent2: The workshop focused on the benefits of freewrites for creativity.
meanings.sent3: She turned her freewrites into a bestselling book.
meanings.sent4: The power of her freewrites was undeniable.
meanings.sent5: Freewrites can be a therapeutic way to release emotions.
